Entries.default: "Now this is a worthy use for animancy."
"I don't see the point of this. We're just gonna get dirty again when we go back outside."
"Sorry, Ishi. I don't think they have a bird bath."
"I had seen the bathhouse before but never entered. I admit its beauty rivals even the salt baths of Gualfi."
"Magic Waters. Were like another life ago."
"You look tense, captain. I have a remedy just for that."
"Oh, good. It's time for my weekly cleansing."
"Pizu Lipasalis tekagu teslikunub bey sabiyi mapan rek tepituk!"
"You think this place works on bunions?"
